translated: The Questions of the Youth Udaya🔽(The Venerable Udaya said):
“I ask the one who is meditating, the stainless one,

analyzed: i t ca ayasmai udayaḥ  kata kitcam an āsava
translated: (thus said the Venerable Udaya)🔽The one who has done what had to be done, the one without pollutants;

analyzed: pāragum sabba dhammāna  atthi pañhena āgama
translated: The one who has gone beyond all things,🔽The one who has come to the end of questions;
Please tell me about the liberation by knowledge,
The breaking apart of ignorance.”🔽(The Blessed One said):
(said the Blessed One)🔽And the two kinds of grief;
Preceded by the investigation of the Dhamma;
I declare the liberation by knowledge,
Is Nibbāna said to be?”🔽(The Blessed One said):
Having come to ask the Blessed One,
When one does not delight in feeling,
The Questions of Udaya Māṇava is the thirteenth.
